about.summary: This is a set of tools for dendrograms and tree plots using 'ggplot2'.  The 'ggplot2' philosophy is to clearly separate data from the presentation. Unfortunately the plot method for dendrograms plots directly to a plot device without exposing the data. The 'ggdendro' package resolves this by making available functions that extract the dendrogram plot data. The package provides implementations for tree, rpart, as well as diana and agnes cluster diagrams.

name: r-ggdendro
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.1-20' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-ggdendro
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  fn: ggdendro_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/ggdendro_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/ggdendro/ggdendro_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 125cae904fa5d426cccaf32ebe9c6297e9ef0c6fd3f19f61513834d03a0cf8ff

build:
  noarch: generic
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 1003
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-ggplot2 >=0.9.2
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-ggplot2 >=0.9.2

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('ggdendro')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('ggdendro')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/andrie/ggdendro
  license: GPL-2 | GPL-3
  summary: This is a set of tools for dendrograms and tree plots using 'ggplot2'.  The 'ggplot2'
    philosophy is to clearly separate data from the presentation. Unfortunately the
    plot method for dendrograms plots directly to a plot device without exposing the
    data. The 'ggdendro' package resolves this by making available functions that extract
    the dendrogram plot data. The package provides implementations for tree, rpart,
    as well as diana and agnes cluster diagrams.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - johanneskoester
    - bgruening
    - daler
    - jdblischak
    - cbrueffer
    - dbast
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
